thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 78 of 625
thread.title: Frustrated

author: Frustrated
title: Frustrated
text: Holy crap. This literally took me FOREVER because the place order button just randomly disappeared and then it kept saying my address wasn't in the United States?? The zip code section would disappear for the billing address so it wouldn't let me type it in. FINALLY I somehow got it to work. I don't ever want to shop here again. So please fix all this buggy stuff.
